## Description {#details}

Allow printing <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/value">json::Value</a> with <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a653cce37b80c03eebe7a00520a8eabb6">formatv()</a>.

The default style is basic/compact formatting, like operator&lt;&lt;. A format string like formatv(&quot;&#123;0:2&#125;&quot;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) pretty-prints with indent 2.

Definition at line 1098 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
